statusDetails.message:
Don't know how to encode {"userName":"User","password":"123"} as a byte stream.

Please use EncoderConfig (EncoderConfig#encodeContentTypeAs) to specify how to serialize data for this content-type.
For example: "given().config(RestAssured.config().encoderConfig(encoderConfig().encodeContentTypeAs("ContentType.JSON", ContentType.TEXT))). .."
